# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-102">Organizirati vaš email</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-103">V Outlooku na spletu, lahko uporabite ukaze, kot **zamah** in **premakniti** samodejno izbrisati ali premakniti sporočila določenega pošiljatelja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-104">Te ukaze se pojavijo nad seznam sporočil, ko izberete sporočilo v mapi Prejeto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-105">**Dimnikar**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-106">omogoča hitro izbriši sporočila v mapi Prejeto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-107">Lahko samodejno izbrisati vse dohodne e-pošto tega pošiljatelja, obdržati samo najnovejše email in izbrišete ostale ali izbrisati email, ki so starejše od 10 dni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-108">**Premakniti**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-109">vam omogoča, da sporočilo določeno sporočilo premaknete v drugo mapo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c5e5-110">Če želite izvedeti več, glejte [delo s sporočilo map v Outlooku na spletu](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c5e5-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
